sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Remove sys_plugins record for com.glide.automated_testing_framework.wbe as it was renamed to com.glide.automated_testing_impl.wce</description>
        <name>Remove Whitelisted Browser Error plugin</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) {
	var pluginGR = new GlideRecord("sys_plugins");
	pluginGR.addQuery("source", "com.glide.automated_testing_framework.wbe");
	pluginGR.query();
	if (pluginGR.next()) {
		pluginGR.deleteRecord();
		gs.info("Removed sys_plugins record with ID: com.glide.automated_testing_framework.wbe as it was renamed to com.glide.automated_testing_impl.wce");
	} else
		gs.info("Did not find a sys_plugins record with ID: com.glide.automated_testing_framework.wbe");
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-02-26 22:19:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>008211196760130091d005225685ef5e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove Whitelisted Browser Error plugin</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Automated Test Framework - Allowed Errors" source="com.glide.automated_testing_impl.wce">c72874203cf1311068bcf327dfe37ffb</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_008211196760130091d005225685ef5e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-02-27 17:15:59</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
